titleStmt.title: An English prosodia to be learned immediately after the Accidence, in order to the better learning of Propria quæ maribus, as in præsenti, and quæ genus. By J. T. A.B.
titleStmt.author: Thomas, James, b. 1657 or 8.

titleStmt.title: An English prosodia to be learned immediately after the Accidence, in order to the better learning of Propria quæ maribus, as in præsenti, and quæ genus. By J. T. A.B.
titleStmt.author: Thomas, James, b. 1657 or 8.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for the author, and are to be had at Robert Whites in Trinity Court near Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: The dedication is signed: James Thomas.
Caption title on p. 1 reads: Prosodia.
The final leaf contains a postscript.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
